basejump
  • Reference

Create tables in LaTeX, HTML, Markdown and reStructuredText

Handle multiple kables in a single RMarkdown chunk.

kables(list, captions = NULL)

Arguments

list

List of column data (e.g. data frame, matrix).
captions

Optional character vector of table captions.

Value

Knit tables, using knitr::kable().

Examples

list(
    starwars,
    head(mtcars)
) %>% kables
#> [[1]]
#> # A tibble: 87 x 13
#>                  name height  mass    hair_color  skin_color eye_color
